thread.title: Take a Look Inside the VLONE x fragment design Pop-Up at THE PARK・ING GINZA
thread.title_full: Take a Look Inside the VLONE x fragment design Pop-Up at THE PARK・ING GINZA

author: Alec Leach
title: Take a Look Inside the VLONE x fragment design Pop-Up at THE PARK・ING GINZA
text:
Visit the original post to see all 10 images from this gallery. 
New buddies VLONE and fragment design have leaked images of their forthcoming pop-up space in Tokyo’s THE PARK・ING GINZA. A$AP Bari’s orange-obsessed label has linked with Hiroshi Fujiwara for a set of gear that’s bound to cause a frenzy among Japanese streetwear youths, and the duo will be unveiling the goods at Fujiwara’s retail space, which is housed in an old car park in Tokyo.
Be sure to head down to the event if you’re in the area tomorrow, March 18. See below for the address:
Sony Building 
B3F 5-3-1 Ginza 
Tokyo 104-0061, 
Japan 
For more fashion news, check out the streetwear mayhem from the Lacoste x Supreme drop in London.
